article: berlin , march ## -lrb- xinhua -rrb- -- the international tourism exchange fair -lrb- itb -rrb- opened in berlin saturday with german economics minister werner mueller appealing to tour operators to include more environmentally friendly vacations in their catalogues .
abstract: international tourism fair opens in berlin
